thread.title: Supreme Court Rules for D.C. Police in Raucous Party Case

author: Jess Bravin
title: Supreme Court Rules for D.C. Police in Raucous Party Case

organizations.name: supreme court rules for d.c. police

text:
WASHINGTON—A unanimous Supreme Court Monday threw out a $1 million verdict against the District of Columbia police, concluding that officers had justification to arrest more than a dozen people at a raucous party even though the charges were eventually dropped.
The suspects contended police had insufficient cause to believe they were trespassing, but Justice Clarence Thomas, writing for the court, disagreed.
